alert.note: Alert for Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 25 at 5:07AM CST until January 25 at 6:45AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Eastern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 645 AM CST. * At 507 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Doster to near Geneva, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Abbeville, Cottonwood, Fort Gaines, Headland, Dothan, Ozark, Fort Rucker, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Level Plains, Slocomb, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, Columbia and Pinckard. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CST for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CST for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida.
